page.title: 19Robert's Family.
page.content: My Dad works in a{butcher's shop}in {Tatworth}which is a village two miles South of{Chard.}He has to prepare the joints of meat ready for the first customers when the shop opens at 7a.m. He gets up at 5a.m. and comes home for lunch at 1p.m. The shop closes at 5.30 p.m. On Wednesdays he has a half day off as the shop closes at lunch time. On Friday nights he goes to rehearsals for the{Chard Light Operatic Group where he sings tenor.This season they are performing "Kiss me Kate" at {Taunton.} Mum works at{Sunnymead Old People's {Home.}She normally works during the {day }but occasionally at night. Mum,Dad,my brother and I went on {holiday}for{Whitweek}to{Cornwall.}We were to have had a caravan but as it broke down we stayed in a guesthouse.
